meanings.definition: To act as a godfather to someone.
meanings.sent1: He is godfathering his best friend's child.
meanings.sent2: John will be godfathering the newborn baby at the christening ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The man joked that he was godfathering so many kids, he should start a daycare.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was godfathering a new generation of talent in the company.
meanings.sent5: Godfathering involves taking on a special role in a child's life.

meanings.definition: The act of being a godfather to someone.
meanings.sent1: His godfathering of the young boy was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: The tradition of godfathering has been passed down for generations in their family.
meanings.sent3: At the family gathering, the topic of godfathering always led to lively discussions.
meanings.sent4: She saw her godfathering as a way to guide and support the child through life.
meanings.sent5: The responsibility of godfathering is taken seriously by many.
